attributes.action: Dissolve the voluntary union with England
attributes.additional_details:
Dissolve The UK voluntary Union with England
Scottish people are sovereign and have that right to decide who and what govern Scotland.

1320 – The Scottish right to self determination based on the people being sovereign is an ancient political principle in Scotland and was first officially document in the Declaration of Arbroath in 1320

Scotland’s right to choose its own future Scottish elections super majority in May 2021 will start discussions to end the voluntary union with England no referendum needed
attributes.background:
Scottish people are sovereign and have that right to decide who and what govern Scotland.

1320 – The Scottish right to self determination based on the people being sovereign is an ancient political principle in Scotland and was first officially document in the Declaration of Arbroath in 1320

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the decision to leave the Union would be a matter for the people of Scotland based on their consent, rather than by a decision of the UK Government.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Give consent to any request for a Scottish Independence Referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572629
